Properties.Code: code for lambda function to run on execution time
Properties.CodeSigningConfigArn: generate from aws signer - validates authenticity
Properties.DeadLetterConfig: where failing events processed by lambda goes to
Properties.Environment: Environment variables that are accessible from function code during execution
Properties.EphemeralStorage: size of /tmp directory in MB default is 512 but it can be any whole number between 512 and 10,240 MB
Properties.ReservedConcurrentExecutions: simultaneous executions to reserve for function
Properties.Runtime: only required if the deployment package is a .zip file archive
Properties.RuntimeManagementConfig: Set runtime management configuration for a functions  version
Properties.VpcConfig: network connectivity to AWS Resources in a VPC
Properties.Ref: return specified value of parameter or resource
